TopicTitle: How to properly rescale the Mk1 cockpit

Articles.Content: When I tried to re scale it it always ends up th same size with the node several meters behind it. What factor do I need to use to rescale so that the flat end is 2.5 m across?
You need to change rescaleFactor to double of what it currently is. If it isn't there add "rescaleFactor = 2"(don't forget the F).
